name: Orca's FigJam KICKOFF Template
description:
At the beginning and end of each week, the Orca team gathers for a kickoff and winddown.


During these meetings, we use FigJam as a visual space to brainstorm, reflect on where we've been, and even run interactive exercises, like public speaking practice.


It's both time-efficient (reading is much faster than speaking) and way more fun than your traditional meeting! This is just one example of many exercises you can do with your team - it's a template of the first one we conducted to get to know each other.


Next time you're having a team kickoff, we'd love for you to try this template - and let us know how it goes!
